New Records: Nicholas Pooran scored 98 runs, overtaking Chris Gayleâ€™s record for West Indies in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran went on a rampage, slamming his foot on the accelerator at the death
Rashid Khan was bowled by Andre Russell for 18 runs
Omarzai bowled the joint most expensive over in T20Is
Pre-Game Insights: Pitches in St Lucia have been friendlier to batters than most in this World Cup, with three totals of 180 or more in four innings so far
West Indies and Afghanistan look to protect their unbeaten records in the last clash before the Super Eight
Post-Match Reflections: Nicholas Pooran burst onto the T20 World Cup, pedal to the metal, and helped West Indies score their highest T20 World Cup total
West Indies finished the group stage with a perfect record
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hazratullah Zazai replaced the injured Mujeeb Ur Rahman in the Afghanistan squad
Mujeeb missed the entire IPL 2024 due to a sprain in the index finger on his bowling hand
Others: The match was played on June 17, 2024, at Gros Islet
